thread.section_title: Groupon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Groupon | www.groupon.com | 21 of 235
thread.title: Deb

author: Deb
title: Deb
text:
I've ordered many items thru Group. Right off hand, I can think of only 2 that I didn't like. Otherwise, I like the service & will continue to use it.
(1) Hanging strawberry bag - all of the plants were dead on arrival. It was a cheap but not a bargain. Too much of a hassle to order & return.
(2) Set of oils - some had spilled out of the bottles & the package was saturated. I would not order these Ever again.
